cover.title:
Jose Avila
Software developer 
& UX/UI designer

bio.title: How can I Help?
bio.desc:
I am a Software developer and UX/UI designer based in Santiago, Chile. I have been working in the web development field for the last 5 years. 
 
I have a strong passion for creating user-friendly interfaces. 
 
Always looking for new challenges and I am always trying to improve my skills.
bio.techs: semantic HTML, CSS, JS (vanilla), React, React native,  Angular, PHP, NodeJs, mongoDB, Mysql, firebase, AWS, github actions, Docker,  Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Premiere

contact.title: Interested on working with me?
contact.desc: I am always open to new projects and I am always looking for new challenges. If you are interested in working with me, please press the button below.
